text:
Ripple star's great, I forgot about that one. Even so, there are SO many amazing songs from other games it seems ridiculous to settle with a Kirby 64 theme.
I suppose it really comes down to preference though.

text: Miracle matter and ripple star along with rock star and the kirby 64 boss theme are underrated as fuck, I'd tell you to listen them, you'll refresh your memory maybe.

text: Kirby's Adventure and Kirby Super Star have the best tunes, IMO.

text: RESPECT! Paper mario 1 is my all time favorite game with all of its amazing subtleties and story I'm not sure why more people don't praise it! The leveling/battle system is great too..

text: I'll have to go through this series at some point. Except for Canvas Curse and Epic Yarn, I mostly played some of the games when I was a kid so I need to refresh my memory.
